sentences.sContent: Make sure all the windows are securely fastened before you leave.
sentences.sCn: 离开前要确保所有的窗子都已关严。

synos.tran: 使固定；集中于；扎牢；强加于

phrases.pCn: v. 集中于；把...强加于；纠缠；抓住，紧紧握住

remMethod.val: fast(牢固的) + en(使…) → 扎牢

words.tran: 快速的，迅速的；紧的，稳固的
扣件；钮扣；按钮；使系牢之物
牢固；不褪色；要塞；巩固；堡垒；迅速

trans.tranOther: to firmly close a window, gate etc so that it will not open, or to become firmly closed
